Title: Adds medical and health insurance information within the definitions of identity theft
Summary: Adds medical and health insurance information within the definitions of identity theft.
LawCode: Amd §§190.78 & 190.79, Pen L; amd §899-aa, Gen Bus L; amd §208, St Tech L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, the general business law and the state technology law, in relation to adding medical and health insurance information within the definitions of identity theft
